Straighten

Converts 3D epochs array [epoch:channel:time] to 2D array [epoch*channel:time].

Inputs

  • numpy.ndarray: Epochs 2D data [epoch:channel:time]

Outputs

  • numpy.ndarray: 2D array [epoch*channel:time]

Example
